stories.title: Scheduler Notification & Assignment
stories.notes: Imported from ClickUp. Original ID: 86ac1zncm, Status: defined
stories.userStory:
As a Ready Roofer special projects scheduler I would like to receive notifications via email & SMS when new special projects are created so that I can schedule a crew and add notes for that special project / job.

As scheduler, get notified on new job.
Who are schedulers? Admins ? Managers? 
Issue: jobs on calendar are currently all jobs, not specifically assigned jobs. 
Problem to solve: Efficiently finding updated jobs when doing sync.
acceptanceCriteria: System emails scheduler automatically on new job creation.
Scheduler can assign crew and set job date/time.
Assigned crew receives notification by email + SMS.
System company scheduler email accounts / addresses are configurable by company admins
Scheduler may add contact notes on the job

stories.title: Warranty Job Creation & Linking
stories.notes: Imported from ClickUp. Original ID: 86ac1znbm, Status: defined
stories.userStory: As office/sales staff I would like the ability to create warranty/special project jobs linked to existing Ready Roofer JobNimbus jobs so that I can create a Warranty &/or special job on a custom ReadyRoofer domain (such as specialprojects.readyroofer.com).
acceptanceCriteria: Staff can choose job type (Warranty / Special Project).
Form optionally includes reference to an existing JobNimbus or CrewGuardian job (jobsite).
Linked JobNimbus or CrewGuardian details auto-populate.
Job entry saved with link to original job or local jobs.

stories.title: Field Job Execution
stories.notes: Imported from ClickUp. Original ID: 86ac1znd4, Status: defined
stories.userStory: As crew member, I would like to receive job details via my preferred communication method (from email, SMS text, & in-app notifications) and have the ability to upload documentation, photos, and make notes on the project so that I can be aware of job criteria, address, timing, and share comments, workmanship evidence, receipts, and information on jobs.
acceptanceCriteria: Crew sees job details (linked job info, materials, schedule).
Crew receives notifications by email + SMS + in-app.
Crew can upload photos.
Crew can generate purchase orders.
Crew can log fuel/mileage and expenses/receipts.
All uploads and entries attach to job record.

stories.title: Internal Damage Reporting
stories.notes: Imported from ClickUp. Original ID: 86ac1zne5, Status: defined
stories.userStory: As crew member I would like the ability to flag internal damage to the job site so that I can notify the team to process for additional jobsite-dependent work.
acceptanceCriteria: Internal Damage option available on job record.
Office notified immediately by email + SMS + in-app.
Flag creates potential follow-up/linked job.
Job view should clearly reflect the "internal damage" flag
Other linked jobs (such as internal damage) should be linked/ listed/ available in Jobs view

stories.title: Job Closeout & Billing
stories.notes: Imported from ClickUp. Original ID: 86ac1zneu, Status: defined
stories.userStory: As office staff I would like to close out jobs by optionally, required, minimum 1, multi-selecting who to charge from "Warrantee", "Roofer", "Project Manager", and "Other" so that I can inform the office that the "job is complete" and "ready for billing / invoicing".
acceptanceCriteria: Closeout requires selection of billing parties.
Multi-select option allowed.
Audit trail records decision maker and timestamp.
Once closed, no further job changes are allowed on the job (except additional immutable notes & audit records) except by Company Admin

stories.title: Notifications & Follow-Up
stories.notes: Imported from ClickUp. Original ID: 86ac1znfa, Status: defined
stories.userStory: As office admin, customer, and/or jobsite crew member I would like to receive appropriate notifications when jobs are created, closed, and optionally when other activities occur (such as comments, equipment, & POs are added) so that I can take appropriate action and have a record of events as related to warrantee & special jobs and so that the company receives feedback on the job from the customer.
acceptanceCriteria: Customer receives email (or optionally SMS text) on completion.
Team notified by email + SMS + in-app on closeout.
Office notified by email + SMS + in-app if damage flagged.
CrewGuardian users are able to configure notifications for special / warrantee jobs

stories.title: Data Tracking & Integrations (aka Connections & Reporting)
stories.notes: Imported from ClickUp. Original ID: 86ac1znfy, Status: defined
stories.userStory:
As a company admin, I would like to capture & be able to view reports on job data so that I can review & act on job information. 

Data we want:
Fuel & Miles
Brand & Shingle Color
Original Job date
Job date
cost of exepnse
crew assigned
pm assigned 
issue type
issue details
time / hrs
per diem 
motels / expenses
acceptanceCriteria: Job captures start/end dates, costs, expenses, receipts.
Job pulls brand + shingle color from JobNimbus if available.
BambooHR integration (push/pull of time/hours) is optional.
Job is able to store & report on all data listed in parent story description
